llmSegmentedChunks.chunkText: How does scheduling work? ● Quick Booking: Bot shows 2 – 3 next available slots. ● Browse Options: Select "Choose another day". ● Day & Time Selection: Pick a day, then a time slot.
Can I book for today or tomorrow? Yes, if availability exists. Slots are labeled "Today" or "Tomorrow".
What happens after I select a time? ● Bot checks if you're a returning customer. ● If new, asks for name. ● Then shows you a full booking summary and quote.
Can I edit my booking before confirming? Yes, use "Edit Quote" to change: ● Service ● Date/time
How do I know my booking is confirmed? You’ll receive a final confirmation with: ● Booking ID ● Service ● Date & Time ● Location
